headline.main: Poor Putting Undermines Tiger's Opening Round
headline.print_headline: Poor Putting Undermines Tiger's Opening Round

docs.snippet: Near-perfect greens and an advantageous tee time did not help Tiger Woods' cause at the PGA Championship on Thursday as the former world number one struggled to a three-over-par 75 in the opening round....
docs.lead_paragraph: Near-perfect greens and an advantageous tee time did not help Tiger Woods' cause at the PGA Championship on Thursday as the former world number one struggled to a three-over-par 75 in the opening round.

headline.main: US Returns $15 Million Picasso Painting Stolen From France
headline.print_headline: US Returns $15 Million Picasso Painting Stolen From France

docs.snippet: The U.S. government on Thursday formally returned a painting by Pablo Picasso valued at $15 million that had been stolen from a Paris museum more than a decade ago and seized by immigration officials late last year in New Jersey....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. government on Thursday formally returned a painting by Pablo Picasso valued at $15 million that had been stolen from a Paris museum more than a decade ago and seized by immigration officials late last year in New Jersey.

headline.main: Judge Spurns Kane's Informal Request on Emails
headline.print_headline: Judge Spurns Kane's Informal Request on Emails

docs.snippet: A judge Thursday rejected an informal request from Pennsylvania's embattled attorney general to authorize the release of pornographic emails that came to light in a scandal she exposed last year....
docs.lead_paragraph: A judge Thursday rejected an informal request from Pennsylvania's embattled attorney general to authorize the release of pornographic emails that came to light in a scandal she exposed last year.

headline.main: Police: Dad Brings Underage Daughter, Friend to Strip Club
headline.print_headline: Police: Dad Brings Underage Daughter, Friend to Strip Club

docs.snippet: Police say a man brought his 16-year-old daughter and her 17-year-old friend to a strip club and let them drink alcohol, do drugs and dance on stage....

headline.main: Causes, Potential Consequences of Testing Opt-Out Movement
headline.print_headline: Causes, Potential Consequences of Testing Opt-Out Movement

docs.snippet: New York is facing a growing rebellion against Common Core-aligned standardized tests. About 20 percent of the state's third- through eighth-graders refused to take the tests this spring, up from 5 percent a year earlier. As state education offici...
docs.lead_paragraph: New York is facing a growing rebellion against Common Core-aligned standardized tests. About 20 percent of the state's third- through eighth-graders refused to take the tests this spring, up from 5 percent a year earlier. As state education officials consider the possibility of sanctions against districts with large numbers of students opting out, they also promise a plan to boost participation.

headline.main: Ohio Traffic Stop Shooting Leads to Front License Plate Bill
headline.print_headline: Ohio Traffic Stop Shooting Leads to Front License Plate Bill

docs.snippet: A motorist's fatal shooting by a University of Cincinnati police officer who stopped him for a missing front license plate has prompted state legislation to prevent police from pulling drivers over for only one plate....
docs.lead_paragraph: A motorist's fatal shooting by a University of Cincinnati police officer who stopped him for a missing front license plate has prompted state legislation to prevent police from pulling drivers over for only one plate.
